text: @JoeBiden Seems Obamacare reduced the options available, despite Mr. Obama's repeated "you can keep your doctor" claims, and made it more expensive for many people.  I imagine Mr. Trump was at least partly responsible for copays being waived for Covid-19 care, too.  Just sayin'.
